Sensor Technologies Inc Company Profile

Sensor Technologies Corp, formerly known as Mooncor Oil & Gas Corp, is a Canada-based company, which develops non-intrusive asset health monitoring sensor systems for the oil and gas market to help operators track the thinning of pipelines and refinery vessels due to corrosion, strain due to bending and process pressure and temperature. The Corporation's fiber optic sensor and corrosion monitoring systems allow remote monitoring capabilities to improve scheduled maintenance operations, avoid shutdowns, and prevent accidents and leaks.
